## embedded-client package

Client library for interacting with embedded Cerbos policy decision points from server-side Node.js and browser-based applications.

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Embedded](./embedded-client.embedded.md)


</td><td>

A client for interacting with an embedded Cerbos policy decision point.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PolicyLoader](./embedded-client.policyloader.md)


</td><td>

Loader to fetch policy bundles from Cerbos Hub.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

</td><td>

[WasmSource](./embedded-client.wasmsource.md)


</td><td>

Source of the embedded policy decision point server's WebAssembly module (imported from `@cerbos/embedded-server/wasm`<!-- -->). The most appropriate source to use will depend on the target runtime of your application.


</td></tr>
